name: Among Bodies
description:
Among Bodies is an awesome Among Us Fan game that adds a new Gamemode for Among Us. 

You have go around the Map (the map is a mixture of all maps in among us ) and find dead bodies and Collect them but Dont step on the landmines. Its fun to see stepping on the Landmines and while in its development I would have Stepped at least a 100 times lol.

The game has NORMAL and SPEEDRUN, normal is the one mentioned above and speedrun is basically similar but adds a timer. Speedrun and collect the Bodies as fast as you Can!

Development And Gameplay Video
